title: Sengoku Dynasty - Ultimate Edition
description: The Ultimate Edition of Sengoku Dynasty contains everything you need to survive in the harsh times of feudal Japan. The soothing soundtrack helps you to relax while the official guide will lead you to victory.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# About this Product
<!--text-->
This pack of digital goodies will enhance your adventure in feudal Japan. Enjoy the sounds of Sengoku Dynasty with the Original Soundtrack or dive into the background story and historical facts with the complete pack of the Scrolls of Sengoku Dynasty, while the Official Guide will ensure your rise to bceome.a legend in the Peasant Kingdom.

**This bundle contains:**

The Full Game (currently in Early Access)
Build and manage villages in an open-world feudal Japan. Survive, explore, meet unique characters, and establish your legacy. Play solo or in co-op multiplayer.

**The Official Guide**
Everything you need to help you get started. From your humble beginnings as a survivor to the creator of thriving settlements, the guide will help you to become a legend in the Peasant Kingdom. 

**Content includes:**

- Overview of the Peasant Kingdom
- Introduction to Multiplayer
- Game Settings
- Important Map Locations
- Overview of the Crafting System
- Overview of the Building System
- Unlockables
- Information about Shrines and Places of Power
- NPC and Trader Lists
- Hunting Tips


and much more!

Like the game itself, the guide is still in "Early Access". As the game grows, the book will also receive new and updated content. Game updates, updates, new areas and possibilities will be constantly updated and brought up to date in the book. An update of the book is planned approximately every 2-4 months depending on the update status of the game in the Early Access phase.

**Note:** The Official Guide for Sengoku Dynasty is only availabe in English and German language.

**Original Soundtrack**
Relive your adventure with the unqiue music tracks designed for Sengoku Dynasty. From exciting driving beats to calming tranquil compositions, the melodies from renowned composer Queen of Noise (Medieval Dynasty, Assassin's Creed Odyssey) are destined to lift up your spirit.

**Scrolls of Sengoku Dynasty**
You can’t get any closer to Sengoku Dynasty. With the scrolls you’ll receive first-hand development infos as well as exciting background stories. Eight issues tell you everything you need to know about Sengoku Dynasty.*

(*) Not all issues are released at the Early Access release of the game. Further issues will be released in the coming weeks.
